periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Slight Chance Drizzle
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before midnight, then a slight chance of drizzle between midnight and 5am. Cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. South southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely before midnight, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 59 overnight. South wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 9am, then rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 63. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 34. Northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 54. East northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Light Rain
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before noon, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 51. West northwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 24. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 38. Northwest wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 25. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 41. West wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. Northwest wind around 9 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
